# Quarto

```{r}
#| message: true
library(tidyverse)
```

Let's ecplore data visualization options

```{r}
cars
view(cars)
```

```{r fig.height=5, fig.width=10}
ggplot(data=mpg, mapping=aes(x=displ, y= hwy))+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(color=class, size=cyl), shape =1)+
  geom_smooth()+
  facet_wrap(~year, nrow=1)

```
